theEphemeral:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theEphemeral:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theEphemeral:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theEphemeral:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theEphemeral:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theEphemeral:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theEphemeral:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theEphemeral:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theEphemeral:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theEphemeral:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theEphemeral:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theEphemeral:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theEphemeral:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
